Mr* G. H. Griffiths
Fund for Adult Education
1444 Wentworth Avenue
Pasadena 5, California
Dear Mr. Griffiths:
As in the case of the UAEB Engineer candidates, we found
it impossible to secure applications for the position of
director of our Placement Service without guaranteeing at
least a two-year contract. This we have done.
In view of this fact, it is our request and hope that
this FAE grant may be extended for a two-year minimum period,
as assurance that the NAEB will have funds to continue this
service for at least that long, since this period is conÂ¬
sidered essential to get such a service adequately established
throughout the United States.
We shall be grateful for your consideration of this
request at your convenience. Meanwhile, our most sincere
appreciation for the service-coordinating steps which the
FAE is making it possible for us to provide to the hundreds
of persons and educational institutions in need of them.
Sincerely,
HJS;wc
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
